thread.title: Monroe's Malik Mallory Earns Falcon Club Player of the Week
thread.title_full: Monroe's Malik Mallory Earns Falcon Club Player of the Week

title: Monroe's Malik Mallory Earns Falcon Club Player of the Week
text:
Monroe's Malik Mallory Earns Falcon Club Player of the Week Posted: Updated: Malik Mallory rushed for 210 yards and two touchdowns in Monroe's 32-27 win over Madison County CHARLOTTESVILLE, Va (WVIR) - 
William Monroe high school running back Malik Mallory is the Falcon Club Player of the Week. 
Mallory rushed for 210 yards and two touchdowns in Monroe's 32-27 win over Madison County on Friday. He also had six tackles on defense to help the Dragons get their first win of the season. 
"We hadn't gotten a win all season," says Mallory. "That game was our Homecoming Game against Madison. I just went out there and tried to run as hard as I could and get yards." 
"Malik was the biggest factor," says head coach Jon Rocha. "We had so many players that did everything they were supposed to do on Friday. His character as a senior and his leadership, that's what I think absolutely got us over the hump this week and find that elusive win." 
William Monroe heads to Woodstock Friday to face Central. Monroe's Malik Mallory Earns Falcon Club Player of the Week More>>
